text: Asian Charlie's Angels ( Yàzhōu bǎn pīlì jiāowá) is a Taiwanese version of the successful 1970s American television show, filmed in Mandarin. Produced in 2001 and airing on ImaginAsian in the United States, the show stars Annie Wu as Annabelle, Kelly Lin as Cindy and Qu Ying as Betty. Christy Chung also appears in the film as Angie. ==Cast== * Qu Ying as Betty * Kelly Lin as Cindy * Annie Wu as Annabelle * Christy Chung as Angie * Kent Cheng as Bosley ==External links== * Category:2004 Taiwanese television series debuts Category:Taiwanese television series Category:Charlie's Angels (franchise)
title: Asian Charlie's Angels
